com.google.gwt.core.ext.linker.impl
Class StandardLinkerContext

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.core.ext.Linker
      com.google.gwt.core.ext.linker.impl.StandardLinkerContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
LinkerContext
public class StandardLinkerContext
extends Linker
implements LinkerContext

An implementation of LinkerContext that is initialized from a ModuleDef.

getConfigurationProperties

public java.util.SortedSet<ConfigurationProperty> getConfigurationProperties()
Description copied from interface: LinkerContext
Returns all configuration properties defined in the module. Configuration properties do not have any impact on deferred-binding decisions, but may affect the behaviors of Generators and Linkers.

Specified by:
getConfigurationProperties in interface LinkerContext

getExtraPathForLinker

public java.lang.String getExtraPathForLinker(java.lang.Class<? extends Linker> linkerType,
                                              java.lang.String partialPath)
Return the full path for an artifact produced by linkertype that has the specified partial path. The full path will be the linker's short name, as defined in the module file, followed by the given partial path.

link

public ArtifactSet link(TreeLogger logger,
                        LinkerContext context,
                        ArtifactSet artifacts)
Description copied from class: Linker
This method is invoked for linkers not annotated with Shardable. It sees all artifacts across the whole compile and can modify them arbitrarily. This method is only called if the linker is not annotated with Shardable.

Overrides:
link in class Linker
Parameters:
logger - the TreeLogger to record to
context - provides access to the Linker's environment
artifacts - an unmodifiable view of the artifacts to link
Returns:
the artifacts that should be propagated through the linker chain

optimizeJavaScript

public java.lang.String optimizeJavaScript(TreeLogger logger,
                                           java.lang.String program)
                                    throws UnableToCompleteException
Description copied from interface: LinkerContext
Applies optimizations to a JavaScript program. This method is intended to be applied to bootstrap scripts in order to apply context-specific transformations to the program, based on the compiler's configuration. The return value will be functionally-equivalent JavaScript, although the exact transformations and structure of the output should be considered opaque. While this function can be safely applied multiple times, the best results will be obtained by performing all JavaScript assembly and calling the function just before writing the selection script to disk.

Specified by:
optimizeJavaScript in interface LinkerContext
Throws:
UnableToCompleteException

produceOutput

public void produceOutput(TreeLogger logger,
                          ArtifactSet artifacts,
                          EmittedArtifact.Visibility visibility,
                          OutputFileSet out)
                   throws UnableToCompleteException
Emit EmittedArtifacts artifacts onto out. Does not close out.

Parameters:
logger - where to log progress
artifacts - the artifacts to emit
visibility - the level of visibility of artifacts to output
out - where to emit the artifact contents
Throws:
UnableToCompleteException
